name: //PRESSURE
description:
//PRESSURE was my Final Major Project in year 2 of BA Design for Games at Plymouth College of Art. A survival horror in text, the game features branching paths and multiple endings.

Following an unnamed young man (known only as Suvivor) in post-apocalyptic Ukraine, the game follows one of his desperate struggles for survival against an unnatural, powerful force that threatens his life.

There's only one thing for it.

Run.
